name: Peterdalyaudio.GitHub.io
body:
Welcome to my Audio Engineering website! My name is Peter Daly and I recently graduated SAE New York's Audio Engineering Diploma program. I have had great opportunities working with consoles like the Presonus 16.4.2, Mackie 1604, Audient ASP8024, Yamaha 02R96, Neve 88R and the SSL 4000G+. 

Check out my Soundcloud links below to hear and download any projects I've worked on previously.

[Soundcloud](<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/users/58013124&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&visual=true"></iframe>)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
